alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 1:59PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Louisiana and southwest Louisiana, including the following parishes, in central Louisiana, Avoyelles, Evangeline and St. Landry. In southwest Louisiana, Acadia, Allen and Jefferson Davis. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 157 PM CST, Heavy rain has ended, but Emergency management reported flooding in the warned area due to earlier thunderstorms. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Eunice, Ville Platte, Marksville, Bunkie, Mamou, Welsh, Kinder, Simmesport, Basile, Oberlin, Elton, Moreauville, Turkey Creek, Fenton, Palmetto, Morrow, Bayou Current, Bordelonville, Cottonport and Pine Prairie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
